appetizers.name: Corn Nuggets
appetizers.description: Golden fried corn nuggets with a crispy exterior and sweet corn center.

appetizers.name: Fried Okra
appetizers.description: Southern-style fried okra with a crispy breaded coating.

appetizers.name: Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Crispy fried dill pickle chips served with ranch dipping sauce.

appetizers.name: Onion Petals
appetizers.description: Battered and fried onion petals with a crispy golden coating.

appetizers.name: Mac & Cheese Bites
appetizers.description: Breaded and fried macaroni and cheese bites with melted cheese center.

appetizers.name: Gator Nuggets
appetizers.description: Crispy fried alligator meat nuggets served with dipping sauce.

appetizers.name: 10 Wings
appetizers.description: Ten chicken wings tossed in your choice of mild, hot, or sweet sauce.

appetizers.name: 10 Wings & Fries
appetizers.description: Ten chicken wings with your choice of sauce served with crispy fries.

appetizers.name: House Garden Salad
appetizers.description: Fresh tossed greens with tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions.

appetizers.name: Bubbalou's Garden Salad
appetizers.description: Fresh tossed greens topped with tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions with your choice of smoked pulled pork, pork, beef, or turkey.
